mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.doctorName, dp.departmentName, d.medicalField, d.treatmentPlace, date_format(d.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(d.editDate, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM doctor d, department dp WHERE d.id = #{id} AND d.department_id = dp.id

SELECT d.id, d.doctorName, dp.departmentName, d.medicalField, d.treatmentPlace, date_format(d.regDate, '%Y-%m-%d'), date_format(d.editDate, '%Y-%m-%d') FROM doctor d, department dp
d.department_id = dp.id
AND d.doctorName LIKE concat('%', #{doctorName}, '%')
OR d.department_id = dp.id
AND d.medicalField LIKE concat('%', #{medicalField}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT ${offset}, ${listCount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doctor (doctorName, medicalField, treatmentPlace, regDate, department_id) VALUES (#{doctorName}, #{medicalField}, #{treatmentPlace}, now(), (SELECT id FROM department WHERE departmentName = #{departmentName}))
mapper.update: UPDATE doctor SET doctorName=#{doctorName}, medicalField=#{medicalField}, treatmentPlace=#{treatmentPlace}, editDate=now(), department_id=(SELECT id FROM department WHERE departmentName = #{departmentName}) WHERE id=#{id}
